settings.allowGroupInviteLabel: Allow others to add me to groups

allowGroupInviteDesc.on: People can add you directly to groups.
allowGroupInviteDesc.off: If someone adds you, you'll receive an invite in 'Pending Invites' and can decide whether to join.
